moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Vice Grip
moves.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team. It may also lower their Speed stats.

moves.name: Mud Shot
moves.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Crabhammer
moves.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
